A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's an ok movie. I found the final act of the movie had some incredible action and was very entertaining. There are some problems with pacing the first half of the movie was pretty boaring and some of the sub plots feel completely pointless. Some of the humour didn't really work and I am pretty disappointed with the way some of the questions from the previous film were answered. Not my favrourite Star Wars movie but it is an ok film. Hope the next one is better.
